item.title: 317 more xp if item is equipped
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Replace “slot” with the equipment slot it’s in. And “itemid” with the itemid.

Try this and see.

if(c.playerEquipment[slot] == itemid) { Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; }

Also, in your Config class, find:

public static final double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;

and change it to:

public static double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;

^ you may need that you may not.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 more xp if item is equipped
